# formattedAddress

**Instance Property**

The address of the place, formatted using its conventions of its country or region.

## Declaration

```swift
formattedAddress?: string;
```

## Place name and category

- **name**: The name of the place.
- **areasOfInterest**: Common names of the area in which the place resides.
- **pointOfInterestCategory**: The category of the place.

items.description: Common names of the area in which the place resides.
